TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DataFormats extends System.Object
public ref class DataFormats abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组预定义数据格式名，可用于标识剪贴板或拖放操作中可用的数据格式。

span.span: Provides a set of predefined data format names that can be used to identify data formats available in the clipboard or drag-and-drop operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类和其他类的实现接口使用所定义的静态格式来描述每个数据对象中存储的数据格式。The class and other classes that implement the interface use the static formats defined by to describe each data format that is stored in a data object. 数据对象通常用于将数据和从系统剪贴板中、 和中拖放操作。Data objects are typically used for transferring data to and from the system clipboard, and in drag-and-drop operations. 下表列出由提供的静态数据格式字段的值。The following table lists the values of the static data format fields provided by . 为仅供参考; 提供了这些字段值一般情况下，代码应该始终引用相应的字段，而不是硬编码字符串。These field values are provided for informational purposes only; in general, code should always refer to the appropriate field, rather than hard-coded strings. |字段Field|字段值Field Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------|-----------------| ||"Bitmap""Bitmap"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] 位图数据格式。Specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] bitmap data format.| ||"CSV""CSV"|指定以逗号分隔的值 (CSV) 数据格式。Specifies a comma-separated value (CSV) data format.| ||"DeviceIndependentBitmap""DeviceIndependentBitmap"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dib](~/includes/tlasharptla-dib-md.md)] 数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dib](~/includes/tlasharptla-dib-md.md)] data format.| ||"DataInterchangeFormat""DataInterchangeFormat"|指定 Windows 数据交换格式 (DIF) 数据格式。Specifies the Windows Data Interchange Format (DIF) data format.| ||"EnhancedMetafile""EnhancedMetafile"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 增强型图元文件格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] enhanced metafile format.| ||"FileDrop""FileDrop"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 文件放置格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] file drop format.| ||"HTML 格式""HTML Format"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] 数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] data format.| ||"Locale""Locale"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 区域设置（区域性）数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] locale (culture) data format.| ||"MetaFilePict""MetaFilePict"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 图元文件图片数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] metafile picture data format.| ||"OEMText""OEMText"|指定标准 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_oem](~/includes/tlasharptla-oem-md.md)] 文本数据格式。Specifies the standard [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_oem](~/includes/tlasharptla-oem-md.md)] text data format.| ||"调色板""Palette"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 调色板数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] palette data format.| ||"PenData""PenData"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 钢笔数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] pen data format.| ||"RiffAudio""RiffAudio"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] 音频数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] audio data format.| ||"多格式文本格式""Rich Text Format"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] 数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] data format.| ||"PersistentObject""PersistentObject"|指定封装任何类型的可序列化数据对象的数据格式。Specifies a data format that encapsulates any type of serializable data objects.| ||"System.String""System.String"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 字符串类数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] string class data format.| ||"SymbolicLink""SymbolicLink"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 符号链接数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] symbolic link data format.| ||"Text""Text"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ansi](~/includes/tlasharptla-ansi-md.md)] 文本数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ansi](~/includes/tlasharptla-ansi-md.md)] text data format.| ||"TaggedImageFileFormat""TaggedImageFileFormat"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] data format.| ||"UnicodeText""UnicodeText"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] 文本数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] text data format.| ||"WaveAudio""WaveAudio"|指定波形音频数据格式。Specifies the wave audio data format.| ||"Xaml""Xaml"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] data format.| ||"XamlPackage""XamlPackage"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 包数据格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] package data format.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Bitmap As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] 位图数据格式。

span.span: Specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] bitmap data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位图将计算机图形表示为一组位在内存中，而这些位表示在映像中的单个像素的属性。A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CommaSeparatedValue As String

summary.span: 指定以逗号分隔的值 (CSV) 数据格式。

span.span: Specifies a comma-separated value (CSV) data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式是经常使用的电子表格一基本交换格式。This format is a basic interchange format commonly used by spreadsheets. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dib As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dib](~/includes/tlasharptla-dib-md.md)] 数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dib](~/includes/tlasharptla-dib-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dib](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dib-md.md)] 是可以加载设计可确保使用一个应用程序创建的位图图形文件格式，并将其显示在另一个应用程序完全它们显示在原始的应用程序的方式。 is a file format designed to ensure that bitmapped graphics created using one application can be loaded and displayed in another application exactly the way they appeared in the originating application. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dif As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 数据交换格式 (DIF) 数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows Data Interchange Format (DIF) data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 差异是在其中数据库、 电子表格和相似的文档进行构造以便于实现由其使用并传输到其他程序的 ASCII 码组成一格式。DIF is a format consisting of ASCII codes in which database, spreadsheet, and similar documents can be structured to facilitate their use by and transfer to other programs. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly EnhancedMetafile As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 增强型图元文件格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] enhanced metafile format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增强型图元文件格式是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]存储方面图图像的文件对象而不是像素。The enhanced metafile format is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 在调整大小时，则图元文件将保留能力优于位图图像。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FileDrop As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 文件放置格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] file drop format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此格式与 shell 文件的拖动在拖放操作期间交互。Use this format to interact with shell file drags during drag-and-drop operations. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

summary.span: 为指定的数据格式返回定义名称和数字 ID 的 对象。

span.span: Returns a object that defines a name and numeric ID for a specified data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法还可以用于注册新的格式。This method can also be used to register new formats. 如果找不到指定的格式，它自动注册为新的数据格式。If the specified format cannot be found, it is automatically registered as a new data format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.DataFormat GetDataFormat(int32 id) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDataFormat (id As Integer) As DataFormat

param.name: id
param.span: 为其请求 对象的数据格式的数字 ID。

span.span: The numeric ID of the data format to request a object for.

summary.span: 为指定的数据格式返回定义名称和数字 ID 的 对象。

span.span: Returns a object that defines a name and numeric ID for the specified data format.

summary.span: 所需的数据格式由数字 ID 指定。

span.span: The desired data format is specified by numeric ID.

returns.span: 一个 对象，包含请求的数据格式的数字 ID 和名称。

span.span: A object that contains the numeric ID and the name of the requested data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法还可以用于注册新的格式。This method can also be used to register new formats. 如果找不到指定的格式，它自动注册为新的数据格式。If the specified format cannot be found, it is automatically registered as a new data format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.DataFormat GetDataFormat(string format) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDataFormat (format As String) As DataFormat

param.name: format
param.span: 为其请求 对象的数据格式的名称。

span.span: The name of the data format to request a object for.

summary.span: 为指定的数据格式返回定义名称和数字 ID 的 对象。

span.span: Returns a object that defines a name and numeric ID for the specified data format.

summary.span: 所需的数据格式由名称（字符串）指定。

span.span: The desired data format is specified by name (a string).

returns.span: 一个 对象，包含请求的数据格式的数字 ID 和名称。

span.span: A object that contains the numeric ID and the name of the requested data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法还可以用于注册新的格式。This method can also be used to register new formats. 如果找不到指定的格式，它自动注册为新的数据格式。If the specified format cannot be found, it is automatically registered as a new data format. 使用此方法要求调用方具有与 Use of this method requires that the caller have with the 标志设置。flag set. 下面的代码演示用于为程序集请求该权限的属性语法。The following code shows the attribute syntax to request this permission for an assembly. ```csharp [assembly: SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.RequestMinimum, Flags = UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard)] ``` ```vb ```

span.span: is .

permission.span: 用于访问低级别的非托管的代码的支持的剪贴板格式的注册。

span.span: for accessing low-level unmanaged code that supports the registration of clipboard formats.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly MetafilePicture As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 图元文件图片数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] metafile picture data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图元文件图片格式是存储在图形对象，而不是像素方面映像的 Windows 文件。The metafile picture format is a Windows file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 在调整大小时，则图元文件将保留能力优于位图图像。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 钢笔数据由所使用的手写软件笔画组成。 pen data consists of pen strokes for handwriting software. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Riff As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] 音频数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] audio data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_riff](~/includes/tla2sharptla-riff-md.md)] 是基于广泛的规范，用于定义对于不同类型的多媒体文件的标准格式而设计。 is a broad-based specification, designed to be used in defining standard formats for different types of multimedia files. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] 数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_rtf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-rtf-md.md)] 是用于传输的文档内容体系结构适应格式应用程序之间的文本文档。 is an adaptation of Document Content Architecture that is used for transferring formatted text documents between applications. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Serializable As String

summary.span: 指定封装任何类型的可序列化数据对象的数据格式。

span.span: Specifies a data format that encapsulates any type of serializable data objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] string class data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SymbolicLink As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 符号链接数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] symbolic link data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 符号链接是接受的文件的目录项的位置，但是实际对不同的目录中的文件的引用的磁盘目录项。A symbolic link is a disk directory entry that takes the place of a directory entry for a file, but is actually a reference to a file in a different directory. 符号链接也可能称为别名、 快捷、 软链接或符号链接。A symbolic link may also be referred to an alias, shortcut, soft link, or symlink. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ansi](~/includes/tlasharptla-ansi-md.md)] text data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Tiff As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_tiff](~/includes/tla2sharptla-tiff-md.md)] 一个标准文件格式通常用于扫描、 存储和交换灰度图形图像。 is a standard file format commonly used for scanning, storage, and interchanges of gray-scale graphic images. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly UnicodeText As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] 文本数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] text data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这种数据格式表示 16 位字符编码 Unicode，也称为 utf-16 和 ucs-2。This data format denotes 16-bit character encoded Unicode, also referred to as UTF-16, and UCS-2. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Xaml As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml#initcap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xamlsharpinitcap-md.md)] 用于表示对象树的一种基于 XML 的语言。 is an XML-based language used to represent a tree of objects. 可以使用任何处理这些对象生成的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]编程语言。Events generated by these objects can be handled using any [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] programming language. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]通常用于描述用户界面 (UI)、 文档和媒体体验。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is typically used to describe user interfaces (UI), documents, and media experiences. 使用此字段类和其他类的实现接口来描述可用数据格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此字段与方法将具有相应格式的数据添加到数据对象; 使用此字段与方法来检索相应格式的数据。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要检查数据对象是否包含此格式的数据，请使用方法来查询的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.
